thread.title: Texas A&M's helmets will light up like Jack-O-Lanterns on Halloween
thread.title_full: Texas A&M's helmets will light up like Jack-O-Lanterns on Halloween

author: Laken Litman
title: Texas A&M's helmets will light up like Jack-O-Lanterns on Halloween
text:
Texas A&M's helmets will light up like Jack-O-Lanterns on Halloween USA Today Sports 10 hrs ago Laken Litman Yes, Oregon has always been known as the No. 1 innovator in college football uniforms thanks to Nike. But look what Texas A&M has been doing with adidas recently.
AdChoices Remember these 1939 throwbacks where the helmets looked like leather? And these icy all-white ones ? These are some particularly creative uniforms for Kevin Sumlin’s team.
For Halloween, they’re throwing a uniform blackout party, which was announced back in August. But what has gone kind of unnoticed is the helmet, that will look like a Jack-O-Lantern. Though the Aggies logo appears to seamlessly blend into the black satin finish, it features all-new reflective technology to “light up the night,” according to adidas.
© Provided by USA Today Sports a&m unis
© Provided by USA Today Sports Via adidas Via adidas
The rest of the Aggies uniforms, which will be worn against South Carolina, look like this:
